overview: The film is an investigative documentary that starts with the accidental discovery of a poem written on the ruins of a building near the railway sometime in the childhood of the director, Alberto Pascual. In the swampy area of ​​the Sierra de Madrid, we discover the history of one of the darkest episodes in the history of Spain during the Franco dictatorship, the sentence of forced labor, a legal instrument that allowed state and private companies to use political opponents of the regime as labor.
title: These Walls
